src_original: mañjuśrīrāha- yatsamā devaputra paramārthatastathatā dharmadhātuḥ atyantājātiśca,  tatsamāni paramārthataḥ pañcānantaryāṇi,
yatsamaḥ paramārthataḥ saṃkleśaḥ tatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānam,
yatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
evaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmasamatāprayukto devaputra bhikṣuḥ samyakprayukta ityucyate //
